actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that individuals who live in the District of Columbia shall not be required to pay Federal income tax for any period during which they are without representation in the Senate and the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides that individuals who live in the District of Columbia shall not be required to pay Federal income tax for any period during which the District of Columbia is without representation in the Senate and the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to provide that individuals who live in the District of Columbia shall not be required to pay Federal income tax for any period during which they are without representation in the Senate and the House of Representatives.
